title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2234/97 of 10 November 1997 amending Regulation (EC) No 3175/94 laying down detailed rules of application for the specific arrangements for the supply of cereal products to the smaller Aegean islands and establishing the forecast supply balance
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2234/97 of 10 November 1997 amending Regulation (EC) No 3175/94 laying down detailed rules of application for the specific arrangements for the supply of cereal products to the smaller Aegean islands and establishing the forecast supply balance
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Regulation (EC) No 3175/94 is hereby replaced by the Annex to the present Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 November 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 184, 27. 7. 1993, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 248, 14. 10. 1995, p. 39.
(3) OJ L 267, 28. 10. 1993, p. 4.
(4) OJ L 174, 26. 7. 1995, p. 27.
(5) OJ L 335, 23. 12. 1994, p. 54.
(6) OJ L 329, 19. 12. 1996, p. 27.
ANNEX
Supply balance for cereals for the smaller Aegean islands for 1997
>TABLE>
These groups are defined in Annexes I and II of Regulation (EEC) No 2958/93.
